name: CreateAsanaMembership
description:
Create a new membership in Asana for goals, projects, portfolios, or custom fields.

This tool creates a new membership in a specified Asana entity, such as a goal, project, portfolio, or custom field. It is used to add teams or users as members and returns the complete record of the newly created membership.

parameters.name: membership_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the fields for the membership. Includes relevant data such as members and target entities.

value_schema.description: The updated fields for the membership.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: If true, returns the response in a formatted JSON with line breaks and indentation. Recommended only for debugging, as it increases response size and processing time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.
